Cell.Title: EEN
Cell.xhtml:p: Select the regional entity that will be in charge of the case either from the Assigned list, or from the Suggestions list. The entity selected in the suggestions, if any, will have priority over the other one when saving.

Hints.Hint: Use this list to select an EEN regional entity from the list of all EEN regional entities in the database

Use this list to select an EEN regional entity amongst the suggestions; suggestions use a matching algorithm based on postal code to nuts code conversion with a fallback to all the regional entities in the country of the SME beneficiary
